title: Connection Issues 10/26/15
body: So...Seems like the people here in St. Bonaventure, New York suddenly can't play League. I'm not sure if it's just a thing here but other players I know can log in in nearby areas. Wish I knew what was up considering how aggravating this is. Anyone else having an issue today? It's stopping me after I input my password and telling me it can't connect after 3 retries.

replies.body:
Hey there Sun Hanum, 

If you have been having this issue more continuously over time, you should probably try Riots Connection KB. That should fix the issue and help keep your disconnection issue to a minimal. 

Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

I'll be on for a bit if you need to reach out to me. 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}

I'll have a look at the option but other games appear to be working. And my neighbors who also play are having the same exact issue. I'm thinking maybe the University's server is blocking our connection to league.

Hi. I made a post about a minute ago regarding in game lag, and the fact that some of my home page tiles aren't showing up when I log in. I understand that my issue is different, but I would like to point out that **I am also based in New York** and I have been having some connectivity issues since yesterday.
